snippet: Mehnaz Afridi, the director of the Holocaust and genocide center at Manhattan College, has drawn praise and criticism from both Jews and Muslims.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column highlights work of Mehnaz M Afridi, professor of religion at Manhattan College who teaches courses about both Islam and the Holocaust; Afridi is an observant Muslim who heads college's Holocaust, Genocide and Interfaith Education Center, and her scholarly work receives praise and contempt from both Muslims and Jews.
lead_paragraph: Mehnaz Afridi, the director of the Holocaust and genocide center at Manhattan College, has drawn praise and criticism from both Jews and Muslims.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Scholar, Looking to ‘Speak the Truth,’ Teaches the Holocaust and Islam
headline.main: Muslim Scholar, Looking to ‘Speak the Truth,’ Teaches the Holocaust and Islam
